articles.author: Lena H. Sun, Dan Keating, Laura Meckler
articles.title: CDC eases mask recommendations, other restrictions, for most Americans - The Washington Post
articles.description: The new guidelines reflect the view that the United States has entered a potentially less dangerous phase of the pandemic.
articles.content: The new guidelines, which took effect Friday, reflect the administrations view that the United States has entered a different, potentially less dangerous phase of the pandemic. The change follows a r… [+9641 chars]
